67:1: ta-baa-ra-kal  lazee    biya-di-hil  mul-ku     wa-hu-wa  a-laa  kul-li  shaiin   qadeer
67:2: al-lazee  kha-la-qal  maw-ta    wa-lhayaa-ta  liyab-lu-wa-kum  ayyu-kum  ah-sa-nu  a-ma-laa  wa-hu-wal  azee-zul   gha-foor
67:3: al-lazee  kha-la-qa  sa-ba  sa-maa-waa-tin  ti-baa-qam  maa  ta-raa  fee  khal-qir  rah-maa-ni  min  ta-faa-wut  far-jiil    ba-sa-ra   hal  ta-raa  min  fu-toor
67:4: sum-mar  jiil     ba-sa-ra   kar-ra-tai-ni  yan-qa-lib  i-lai-kal  ba-sa-ru   khaa-si-anw  wa-hu-wa  haseer
67:5: wa-la-qad  zaiyan-nas  sa-maaaad  du-nyaa    bi-ma-saa-bee-ha  wa-jaal-naa-haa  ru-joo-mal  lis-hshayaa-tee-ni  waa-tad-naa  la-hum  a-zaa-bas  saeer
67:6: wa-lil-la-zee-na  ka-fa-roo  bi-rab-bi-him  a-zaa-bu  ja-han-na-ma  wa-bi-sal  maseer
67:7: i-zaaa  ul-qoo  fee-haa  sa-mioo  la-haa  shahee-qanw  wa-hiya  ta-foor
67:8: ta-kaa-du  ta-mayya-zu  mi-nal  ghaizz     kul-la-maaa  ul-qiya  fee-haa  faw-jun  saa-la-hum  kha-za-na-tu-haaa  a-lam  ya-ti-kum  nazeer
67:9: qaa-loo  ba-laa  qad  jaaaa-naa  nazee-run  fa-kaz-zab-naa  wa-qul-naa  maa  naz-za-lal  laa-hu   min  shaiin   in  an-tum  il-laa  fee  da-laa-lin  kabeer
67:10: wa-qaa-loo  law  kun-naa  nas-mau  aw-na  qi-lu    maa  kun-naa  feee  a-shaa-bis  saeer
67:12: in-nal  lazee-na   yak-hshaw-na  rab-ba-hum  bil-ghai-bi  la-hum  mag-hfi-ra-tunw  waaj-run  kabeer
67:13: waa-sir-roo  qaw-la-kum  a-wi  jha-roo  bih   in-na-hoo  alee-mum  bi-zaa-tis  su-door
67:14: a-laa  ya-la-mu  man  kha-la-qa  wa-hu-wal  latee-ful  khabeer
67:15: hu-wal  lazee    jaa-la  la-ku-mul  ar-da    za-loo-lan  fam-shoo   fee  ma-naa-ki-bi-haa  wa-ku-loo  mir  riz-qih   wai-lai-hin  nu-shoor
67:16: aa-min-tum  man  fis  sa-maaai  ai  yak-hsi-fa  bi-ku-mul  ar-da    fai-zaa  hiya  ta-moor
67:17: am  a-min-tum  man  fis  sa-maaai  ai  yur-si-la  a-lai-kum  haa-si-ban  fa-sa-ta-la-moo-na  kai-fa  nazeer
67:18: wa-la-qad  kaz-za-bal  lazee-na   min  qab-li-him  fa-kai-fa  kaa-na  nakeer
67:19: a-wa-lam  ya-raw  i-lat  tai-ri    faw-qa-hum  saaaf-faa-tinw  wayaq-bidn   maa  yum-si-ku-hun-na  il-lar  rah-maan    in-na-hoo  bi-kul-li  shaiin   baseer
67:20: am-man  haa-zal  lazee    hu-wa  jun-dul  la-kum  yan-su-ru-kum  min  doo-nir  rah-maan    i-nil  kaa-fi-roo-na  il-laa  fee  ghu-roor
67:21: am-man  haa-zal  lazee    yar-zu-qu-kum  in  am-sa-ka  riz-qah   bal  laj-joo  fee  u-tuw-winw  wa-nu-foor
67:22: a-fa-mai  yam-shee  mu-kib-ban  a-laa  wa-jhihee  ah-daaa  am-ma-ny  yam-shee  sa-wiyyan  a-laa  si-ra-tim  mus-taqeem
67:23: qul  hu-wal  lazee    an-shaa-kum  wa-jaa-la  la-ku-mus  sa-ma     wa-lab-saa-ra  wa-la-fi-da-ta  qalee-lam  maa  tas-hku-roon
67:24: qul  hu-wal  lazee    za-raa-kum  fil  ar-di    wai-lai-hi  tuh-sha-roon
67:25: waya-qoo-loo-na  ma-taa  haa-zal  wa-du     in  kun-tum  saa-diqeen
67:26: qul  in-na-mal  il-mu      in-dal  laa-hi   wain-na-maaa  a-na  nazee-rum  mubeen
67:27: fa-laam-maa  raa-whu  zul-fa-tan  seeeat   wu-joo-hul  lazee-na   ka-fa-roo  waqee-la  haa-zal  lazee    kun-tum  bihee  tad-daoon
67:28: qul  a-raay-tum  in  ah-la-ka    niyal    laa-hu  wa-mam  maiya   aw        ra-hi-ma-naa  fa-maiyu-jee-rul  kaa-fi-ree-na  min  a-zaa-bin  aleem
67:29: qul  hu-war  rah-maa-nu  aa-man-naa  bihee  waa-lai-hi  ta-wak-kal-naa  fa-sa-ta-la-moo-na  man  hu-wa  fee  da-laa-lim  mubeen
67:30: qul  a-raay-tum  in  as-ba-ha  maaau-kum  ghaw-ran  fa-mai  ya-tee-kum  bi-maaaim  maeen
